name: Fortune Fishing (test)
description:
How to play:

Your mission is to catch as many golden fish as you can.

All fish is hiding behind this:

-----------------------

To move use arrow [UP], [DOWN], [RIGHT], [LEFT].

To catch fish, click [left mouse button]

++++++++++++++

Also, you can use Joystick

To catch fish, click [A]

-----------------------
